title.value: SNOMED CT Solor Extension Temporary Code System

description.value: A set of codes that are defined in the Solor extension to the SNOMED CT code system. To be used until they are adopted by SNOMED CT.

display.value: Digital thermometer (physical object)

definition.value: A device used to measure temperature with digital readout.

display.value: Non-contact infrared thermometer (physical object)

definition.value: A device used to measure temperature via infrared technology that does not come into contact with the skin.

display.value: Thermoluminescent diode thermometer (physical object)

definition.value: A device used to measure temperature that uses a thermoluminescent diode.

display.value: Blood pressure cuff, ankle type (physical object)

definition.value: A blood pressure cuff sized to use on an ankle.

display.value: Blood pressure cuff, extra large adult thigh cuff (physical object)

definition.value: A blood pressure cuff large enough to use on the thigh.

display.value: Blood pressure cuff, infant size (physical object)

definition.value: A blood pressure cuff sized to use on an infant.

display.value: Blood pressure cuff, neonatal size 1 (physical object)

definition.value: A blood pressure cuff of size 1 for a newborn.

display.value: Blood pressure cuff, neonatal size 2 (physical object)

definition.value: A blood pressure cuff of size 2 for a newborn.

display.value: Blood pressure cuff, neonatal size 3 (physical object)

definition.value: A blood pressure cuff of size 3 for a newborn.

display.value: Blood pressure cuff, neonatal size 4 (physical object)

definition.value: A blood pressure cuff of size 4 for a newborn.

display.value: Blood pressure cuff, neonatal size 5 (physical object)

definition.value: A blood pressure cuff of size 5 for a newborn.

display.value: Blood pressure cuff, upper arm, adult size universal (physical object)

definition.value: A blood pressure suff size that is universal in size for adults on the upper arm.

display.value: Blood pressure cuff, adult size medium (physical object)

definition.value: A blood pressure suff size that is in between small and large sizes for adults on the upper arm.

display.value: Computer aided auscultation (procedure)

definition.value: A procedure that uses a computer aided device to measure blood pressure.

display.value: Measurement of blood pressure using intravascular transducer (procedure)

definition.value: A device that measures blood pressure intravascularly via a trandsducer.

display.value: Wearing street clothes, no shoes (finding)

definition.value: The subject is wearing clothing but not shoes.

display.value: Wearing street clothes with shoes (finding)

definition.value: The subject is wearing clothing and shoes.

display.value: Stadiometer (physical object)

definition.value: A device used to measure a subject's height.

display.value: Capnograph sensor device (physical object)

definition.value: A device that captures expelled air, either via nasal prongs or CPAP and is used to measure the number of breaths taken per minute.

display.value: Respiration strain gauge (physical object)

definition.value: A device wrapped around a subject chest that measures the number of times a subject's chest expands with each inhalation. This counts the breaths per minute.

display.value: Patient lift scale (physical object)

definition.value: A device used to lift a patient out of or into bed and also has a scale to measure the subject's weight.

display.value: Automated office blood pressure

definition.value: A blood pressure measurement protocol that directs a blood pressure to be taken via an automatic blood pressure device several times and then averaged and recorded.
